newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Two S.Korean flour firms seek 22,000T U.S. wheat.
newsitem.headline: Two S.Korean flour firms seek 22,000T U.S. wheat.

text.p: South Korea's Cheiljedang Corp and Dongah Flour Mills Co Ltd have jointly invited tenders to buy a combined 22,000 tonnes of U.S. wheat by 2:00 p.m. (0500GMT) on Thursday, traders said.
Cheiljedang wants to buy 9,000 tonnes of the total at basis over May futures on the U.S grain futures exchanges, including the Chicago Board of Trade, traders said.
Dongah Flour is seeking the remaining 13,000 tonnes at flat purchase prices.
Shipment for the 22,000 tonnes was set for March 10-April 10 to the southeastern port of Pusan.
